languages.text: Кровавые события, произошедшие в Просторе, заставили многих стать осторожнее, и дела Миссии Касбаллики шли неудачно. Вскоре среди хладных торговцев поползли слухи о "Комиссии", прорвавшейся сквозь Зев в Простор и явившейся для проверки активов и "необходимых мер по ревизии предприятия". В словах этих всем чудилась зловещая угроза.

Violence throughout the Expanse put many on their guard, and as a result, the Kasballica Mission's business declined. Soon, rumours surfaced among the Cold Traders about a so-called "Commission" that had made it through the Maw and into the Expanse. Its professed purpose was to audit assets and "take measures to restructure operations." These words carried with them an ominous threat.
languages.original_text: Кровавые события, произошедшие в Просторе, заставили многих стать осторожнее, и дела Миссии Касбаллики шли неудачно. Вскоре среди хладных торговцев поползли слухи о "Комиссии", прорвавшейся сквозь Зев в Простор и явившейся для проверки активов и "необходимых мер по ревизии предприятия". В словах этих всем чудилась зловещая угроза.

traits.locale_text: Violent events that happened in the Expanse pushed many to become more careful, and as a result, Kasballica Mission's business was declining. Soon, among the Cold Traders surfaced some rumours about a so-called Inspection that got through the Maw and into the Expanse. Its role was to audit the assets and "take measures to revise the operation". People felt an ominous threat in these words.

Violent events that happened in the Expanse pushed many to become more careful, and as a result, Kasballica Mission's business was declining. Soon, among the Cold Traders surfaced some rumours about a so-called Inspection that got through the Maw and into the Expanse. Its role was to audit the assets and "take measures to revise the operation". People felt an ominous threat in these words.

Violence throughout the Expanse made many more careful, and as a result, the Kasballica Mission's business was declining. Soon, rumours surfaced among the Cold Traders about a so-called "Inspection" that got through the Maw and into the Expanse. Its professed role was to audit assets and "take measures to revise the operation." These words carried with them an ominous threat.

Violence throughout the Expanse made many more careful, and as a result, the Kasballica Mission's business was declining. Soon, rumours surfaced among the Cold Traders about a so-called "Inspection" that got through the Maw and into the Expanse. Its professed role was to audit assets and "take measures to revise the operation." These words carried with them an ominous threat.

Violence throughout the Expanse put many on their guard, and as a result, the Kasballica Mission's business declined. Soon, rumours surfaced among the Cold Traders about a so-called "Commission" that had made it through the Maw and into the Expanse. Its professed purpose was to audit assets and "take measures to restructure operations." These words carried with them an ominous threat.

Violence throughout the Expanse put many on their guard, and as a result, the Kasballica Mission's business declined. Soon, rumours surfaced among the Cold Traders about a so-called "Commission" that had made it through the Maw and into the Expanse. Its professed purpose was to audit assets and "take measures to restructure operations." These words carried with them an ominous threat.

languages.text: 科罗努斯扩区的暴力事件让许多人胆战心惊，卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团的生意也因此每况愈下。很快，冷市商人间就开始出现了谣言，声称“审查团”已经穿过了巨口，进入了科罗努斯扩区。这些人明面上的职责是审计资产，并“采取措施，整改运营模式”。这些话隐约带着某种不祥的威胁。
languages.original_text: Violence throughout the Expanse put many on their guard, and as a result, the Kasballica Mission's business declined. Soon, rumours surfaced among the Cold Traders about a so-called "Commission" that had made it through the Maw and into the Expanse. Its professed purpose was to audit assets and "take measures to restructure operations." These words carried with them an ominous threat.

traits.locale_text: 科罗努斯扩区的暴力事件让许多人变得更加谨慎，卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团的生意也因此每况愈下。很快，冷市商人间就开始出现了谣言，声称“审查团”已经穿过了巨口，进入了科罗努斯扩区。这些人明面上的职责是审计资产，并“采取措施，整改运营模式”。这些话隐约带着某种不祥的威胁。

languages.text: Die hemmungslose Gewalt in der Ausdehnung ließ viele sehr viel vorsichtiger werden, was sich negativ auf die Geschäfte der Kasballica-Mission auswirkte. Bald kamen unter den Kalthändlern Gerüchte über eine so genannte "Kommission" auf, die durch den Schlund und in die Ausdehnung gelangt war. Ihr Auftrag war offenbar, sämtliche Einheiten einer Prüfung zu unterziehen und "Maßnahmen zur Restrukturierung der Operation zu ergreifen". Eine düstere Warnung lag in diesen Worten.
languages.original_text: Violence throughout the Expanse put many on their guard, and as a result, the Kasballica Mission's business declined. Soon, rumours surfaced among the Cold Traders about a so-called "Commission" that had made it through the Maw and into the Expanse. Its professed purpose was to audit assets and "take measures to restructure operations." These words carried with them an ominous threat.

traits.locale_text: Die hemmungslose Gewalt in der Ausdehnung ließ viele sehr viel vorsichtiger werden, was sich negativ auf die Geschäfte der Kasballica-Mission auswirkte. Bald kamen unter den Kalthändlern Gerüchte über eine so genannte "Inspektion" auf, die durch den Schlund und in die Ausdehnung gelangt war. Ihr Auftrag war offenbar, sämtliche Einheiten einer Prüfung zu unterziehen und "Maßnahmen zur Revision der Operation zu ergreifen". Eine düstere Warnung lag in diesen Worten.

languages.text: La violence qui sévissait dans les Étendues forçait à la prudence, une situation qui nuisait aux affaires de la Mission de la Kasballica. Des rumeurs ne tardèrent pas à circuler chez les adeptes du Commerce Froid à propos d'une « commission » qui serait passée à travers la Gueule et aurait atteint les Étendues. Son objectif était apparemment d'auditer les ressources et de « prendre les mesures nécessaires pour restructurer les opérations ». Ces mots étaient en eux-mêmes une inquiétante menace.
languages.original_text: Violence throughout the Expanse put many on their guard, and as a result, the Kasballica Mission's business declined. Soon, rumours surfaced among the Cold Traders about a so-called "Commission" that had made it through the Maw and into the Expanse. Its professed purpose was to audit assets and "take measures to restructure operations." These words carried with them an ominous threat.

traits.locale_text: La violence qui sévissait dans les Étendues forçait la prudence, une situation qui nuisait aux affaires de la Mission de la Kasballica.Des rumeurs ne tardèrent pas à circuler chez les adeptes du Commerce Froid à propos d’une « inspection » qui serait passée à travers la Gueule et parvenue dans les Étendues. Son rôle était apparemment d'auditer les ressources et de « prendre les mesures nécessaires pour remanier l'opération ». Ces mots étaient en eux-mêmes une inquiétante menace.

languages.text: La violencia de la Extensión hizo que muchos fueran más cautos, y, como resultado, el negocio de la misión Kasballica fue en declive. Pronto aparecieron rumores entre los Comerciantes Fríos sobre una supuesta «comisión» que había llegado a la Extensión a través de las Fauces. Según informó, había viajado para auditar la mercancía y «tomar medidas para reestructurar la operación». Esas palabras encerraban una oscura amenaza.
languages.original_text: Violence throughout the Expanse put many on their guard, and as a result, the Kasballica Mission's business declined. Soon, rumours surfaced among the Cold Traders about a so-called "Commission" that had made it through the Maw and into the Expanse. Its professed purpose was to audit assets and "take measures to restructure operations." These words carried with them an ominous threat.

traits.locale_text: La violencia de la Extensión hizo que muchos fueran más cautos, y, como resultado, el negocio de la misión Kasballica fue en declive. Pronto aparecieron rumores entre los Comerciantes Fríos sobre una supuesta «Inspección» que había llegado a la Extensión a través de las Fauces. Supuestamente, había viajado para auditar la mercancía y «tomar medidas para revisar la operación». Esas palabras encerraban una oscura amenaza.

languages.text: エクスパンス全域で暴力が頻発し、多くの人々が警戒を強めるようになった。その結果、カスバリカ聖務団のビジネスは衰退していった。やがて、闇商人たちの間で「手数料」と呼ばれるものがマウを通過してエクスパンスに侵入したという噂が流れた。その目的は、資産を監査し、「経営再建のための措置を講じること」と公言されていたが、その言葉には恐ろしい脅しが込められていた。
languages.original_text: Violence throughout the Expanse put many on their guard, and as a result, the Kasballica Mission's business declined. Soon, rumours surfaced among the Cold Traders about a so-called "Commission" that had made it through the Maw and into the Expanse. Its professed purpose was to audit assets and "take measures to restructure operations." These words carried with them an ominous threat.

traits.locale_text: エクスパンス全域で暴力が頻発し、多くの人々が警戒を強めるようになった。その結果、カスバリカ聖務団のビジネスは衰退していった。やがて、闇商人たちの間で「手数料」と呼ばれるものがマウを通過してエクスパンスに侵入したという噂が流れた。その目的は、資産を監査し、「経営再建のための措置を講じること」と公言されていたが、その言葉には恐ろしい脅しが込められていた。

languages.text: Enginlik'in dört bir yanına saçılan bu vahşet, birçoklarının gardını kaldırmasına neden olup Kasballica Misyonu'nun işlerini azalttı. Çok geçmeden Soğuk Tacirler arasında, Ağız'dan geçip Enginlik'e ulaşan, "Komisyon" ismindeki bir şeyin söylentileri yayılmaya başladı. Amacının, varlıkları denetlemek ve "faaliyetleri yeniden yapılandıracak önlemler almak" olduğu ileri sürüldü. Bu amaç, uğursuz bir tehdide gebeydi.
languages.original_text: Violence throughout the Expanse put many on their guard, and as a result, the Kasballica Mission's business declined. Soon, rumours surfaced among the Cold Traders about a so-called "Commission" that had made it through the Maw and into the Expanse. Its professed purpose was to audit assets and "take measures to restructure operations." These words carried with them an ominous threat.

traits.locale_text: Enginlik boyunca meydana gelen vahşet, birçoklarını gardını indirmemeye zorladı ve sonuç olarak da Kasballica Misyonu'nun işleri geriledi. Çok geçmeden Soğuk Tacirler arasında, Ağız'dan geçen ve Enginlik'e ulaşan "Komisyon" ismindeki bir şeyin söylentileri yayılmaya başladı. İleri sürülen amacı, varlıkları denetlemek ve "operasyonları yeniden yapılandıracak önlemler almak" idi. Bu sözcükler, içlerinde uğursuz bir tehdit barındırıyorlardı.
